author: alexp7
title: DALE
description: LATAM is a complex ecosystem of 33 countries and 660M people. We need to foster collaboration to help onboard LATAM people to CARDANO
solution: A powerful decentralized alliance of organizations, projects, people and governments to drive Cardano adoption and its real impact.
experience: Our team is very diverse, formed by Cardano stakeholders, Proposers, SPO, Developers, CAs, Challenge Team & Holders from countries in LATAM
